code: import{Accordion,AccordionItem,AccordionButton,AccordionPanel,Text,Box}from"@chakra-ui/react";import Data from"../data/faq.json";import{colors}from"../themes";import MinusIcon from"./icons/Minus";import PlusIcon from"./icons/Plus";import useWindowSize from"../hooks/ScreenSIze";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FaqAccordion=()=>{const isMobile=useWindowSize();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Accordion,{allowToggle:true,allowMultiple:true,children:Data.map(data=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccordionItem,{pt:5,sx:{border:"none"},children:_ref=>{let{isExpanded}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(AccordionButton,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{as:"span",flex:"1",fontWeight:"700",fontSize:isMobile?"16px":"18px",textAlign:"left",color:colors.darkPurple,children:data.question}),isExpanded?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MinusIcon,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlusIcon,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccordionPanel,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:colors.grayishPurple,children:data.answer})})]});}},data.id))});};export default FaqAccordion;
